weapons.name: Assault Rifle
weapons.description: Standard military-grade assault rifle with good all-around performance.

weapons.name: Sniper Rifle
weapons.description: Long-range precision rifle with excellent accuracy at distance.

weapons.name: Shotgun
weapons.description: Close-range weapon with devastating stopping power.

weapons.name: Plasma Pistol
weapons.description: Advanced sidearm that fires superheated plasma bolts.

weapons.name: Laser Rifle
weapons.description: Precision energy weapon with excellent range and accuracy.

weapons.name: Vibro-Blade
weapons.description: High-frequency blade that can cut through most materials.

weapons.name: Pulse Cannon
weapons.description: Heavy energy weapon that emits devastating pulses of energy.

weapons.name: Gauss Rifle
weapons.description: Electromagnetic rifle that fires metal projectiles at extreme velocities.

weapons.name: Flamethrower
weapons.description: Weapon that projects streams of ignited fuel, setting targets ablaze.

weapons.name: Neural Disruptor
weapons.description: Non-lethal weapon that temporarily disrupts neural functions.

armor.name: Light Armor
armor.description: Basic protection that doesn't restrict movement.

armor.name: Combat Armor
armor.description: Standard military-grade armor with good all-around protection.

armor.name: Heavy Armor
armor.description: Heavy-duty armor that provides excellent protection at the cost of mobility.

armor.name: Powered Armor
armor.description: Advanced exoskeleton that enhances strength while providing superior protection.

armor.name: Stealth Suit
armor.description: Specialized suit that reduces visibility to sensors and the naked eye.

armor.name: Hazard Suit
armor.description: Specialized protection against environmental hazards and contamination.

gear.name: Medkit
gear.description: Standard medical kit for treating injuries in the field.

gear.name: Repair Kit
gear.effect: Repair damaged equipment or restore 1D6 health to bots
gear.description: Tools and parts for field repairs of equipment and mechanical units.

gear.name: Scanner
gear.effect: Detect hidden objects and lifeforms within 12 inches
gear.description: Handheld device that can detect various signatures through walls and obstacles.

gear.name: Grapple Gun
gear.effect: Move to any point within 18 inches that can support your weight
gear.description: Launches a grappling hook that allows rapid vertical and horizontal movement.

gear.name: Stim Pack
gear.effect: +1 to all stats for one turn, then -1 to all stats for one turn
gear.description: Combat stimulant that temporarily enhances performance followed by a crash.

gear.name: Cloaking Device
gear.effect: Become invisible to visual detection for 1D3 turns
gear.description: Personal stealth field generator that bends light around the user.

gear.name: Energy Shield
gear.effect: +2 protection against all attacks for 1D3 turns
gear.description: Portable energy barrier that provides temporary protection from attacks.

gear.name: Hacking Tool
gear.effect: Bypass electronic locks or control automated systems
gear.description: Advanced device for interfacing with and overriding electronic systems.

attachments.name: Weapon Scope
attachments.description: Optical enhancement that improves accuracy at long distances.

attachments.name: Silencer
attachments.description: Suppresses the sound of weapon discharge.

attachments.name: Extended Magazine
attachments.description: Increases ammunition capacity, allowing for more shots before reloading.

attachments.name: Targeting System
attachments.description: Advanced aiming assistance that improves accuracy at all ranges.

attachments.name: Bayonet
attachments.effect: Can be used as a melee weapon (damage 1)
attachments.description: Blade attachment that allows the weapon to be used in close combat.

attachments.name: Stabilizer
attachments.description: Reduces weapon recoil, improving control during sustained fire.
